tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    client_id UUID NOT NULL,
    consultation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE legal_documents (
  document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255),
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE consent_forms (
  form_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  practitioner_id UUID,
  consent_given_at TIMESTAMP,
  consent_status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (practitioner_id) REFERENCES practitioners(practitioner_id)
);

CREATE TABLE consultations (
    consultation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    doctor_id UUID NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE legal_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    document_content TEXT,
    signatory_name VARCHAR(100),
    signatory_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE consent_forms (
    form_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    form_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    form_description TEXT,
    signature_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    signatory_name VARCHAR(100),
    signatory_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE consultations (
    consultation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    consultation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
    practitioner_id UUID NOT NULL,
    consultation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE LegalDocuments (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR,
    patient_id INT,
    consultation_date DATE,
    document_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR,
    birthdate DATE,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE ConsentForms (
    form_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    form_name VARCHAR,
    patient_id INT,
    consent_date DATE,
    form_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Consultations (
    consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    consultation_date DATE,
    patient_id INT,
    practitioner_id INT,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Practitioners (
    practitioner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    practitioner_name VARCHAR,
    specialization VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR
);
